summary.para: Describes the opacity and transformation of a brush.

remarks.para: This structure is used when creating a brush. For convenience, Direct2D provides the function for creating D2D1_BRUSH_PROPERTIES structures.
After creating a brush, you can change its opacity or transform by calling the or methods.

summary.para: A value between 0.0f and 1.0f, inclusive, that specifies the degree of opacity of the brush.
The transformation that is applied to the brush.
